page.description: Does a quick sort of the records using the selected field.

argument.name: ascending
argument.description: Optional. Default = .T. (TRUE), .T. = Ascending sort, .F. = Descending sort.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.QUICK_SORT() method performs the same action as the Quick Sort commands.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script is attached to a button. It gives focus to the Customer field, then sorts the data by this field.
